details.description: Creative Developer passionate about building immersive web experiences with cutting-edge technologies.
AI-powered chatbot with real-time conversation capabilities, authentication system, and dark mode support.
details.trouble: Handling token refresh and maintaining session state across page reloads was challenging.
details.shooting: Implemented a robust token refresh mechanism with interceptors and local storage caching for session persistence.
details.lesson: Learned the importance of proper state management and the nuances of JWT authentication flows.

details.description: This portfolio itself! A 3D neural network visualization showcasing projects as interconnected neurons.
details.trouble: Achieving smooth camera animations while maintaining 60fps with many nodes and connections.
details.shooting: Used instanced meshes, optimized shaders, and GSAP for hardware-accelerated animations.
details.lesson: Deep understanding of WebGL performance optimization and the power of custom shaders.

details.description: Collection of interactive games built with Processing, featuring Arduino joystick controls.
details.trouble: Synchronizing Arduino input with game state and handling multiple game modes.
details.shooting: Created a modular input system that abstracts hardware controls for all game modes.
details.lesson: Hardware-software integration requires careful consideration of timing and state management.

details.description: Modern React development with hooks, concurrent features, and server components.
Type-safe JavaScript development for scalable applications.
3D graphics programming with WebGL, React Three Fiber, and custom shaders.
Backend development with FastAPI, async programming, and AI integrations.
